经典塔防，这代可以双人非常适合联机。以前跟基友在游侠联机平台暑假爽玩。
装备、饰品选择多样，并且这代有了更多有趣的陷阱，升级选项也很丰富。男女主的装备、陷阱也有一定差异（比如女主有冰冻陷阱但是没有男主的沥青陷阱）。
*不过因为年代久远在win11上运行时有闪退问题。

185255315.review: stupid game crashes all the time

185009621.review:
Bestest shooter / tower defense hybrid I know.  It's fun, it's flashy, it's cool looking, you're cool, everything's cool.
Map design, sound effects, music, voices, art style, graphics, it's all done very well and combines into a game that's just.. a lot of fun to play.

You have an array of cool weapons to unlock, and ditto traps.  You're also totally free to choose a playstyle.  If you don't want to rely heavily on traps, you can go with projectile or melee weapons, or you can go full no-touch mastermind and use only traps and maneuvering, this is left up to you in the most organic way possible - you just pick the equipment you prefeer at the start of the round and that's it.

It also beats Orcs Must Die 3, which is ok, but can't quite compare to its predecessor.

There's some mouse acceleration, which becomes noticable if you're playing with high DPI.  Not a game breaker, but can be a little annoying to get used to.

Wish it had workshop/addon support :F  If it did it would become the stuff of legends.

184979509.review:
[h3] A tower defense game that redefined the genre and built upon a wonderful first installment in every way.[/h3]
Orcs Must Die! 2 was an extraordinary sequel to the first game, introducing co-op and a brand new hero armed with her own unique weapons and abilities. It takes the wonderful trap-defense formula established in the first game and develops on it with incredible map design, wonderful traps and weapons to use, and an engaging level-up system.

Pick it up on sale when you can to get all DLC which will add more enemies, weapons, trinkets and maps. This is one of my favourite games of all time, and I hope it stays with you as long as it has for me!

184758550.review:
This game is absolute riot, chaotic, and so much fun... when it works. But honestly, what’s up with it crashing in the final rounds? It’s like the devs built the perfect party and then forgot to pay the electricity bill.

Fix your servers, guys. This isn’t 1999, and we’re not on dial-up anymore. Until then, it’s hard to fully enjoy a game that keeps rage-quitting on me.

Rating: 2.5/5. Play it if you like laughing and crying at the same time.

184758220.review: Funny as hell, but also buggy as hell. Sad.

184753324.review:
Comprei por pura nostalgia. Na época vi um Youtuber jogando e gostei bastante, pena que eu não podia comprar. 10 anos depois decidi pegar para testar e que bom que eu fiz isso ja foi uma surpresa me deparar com a dublagem brasileira e matar orcs me faz sentir a mesma satisfação que matar os zumbis em Left 4 Dead, os orcs viram ragdoll e saem voando, explodem em pedaços e perdem membros do corpo com os ataques do jogador. Cada fase faz você ter que pensar numa estratégia diferente, o chato é ter que ir pro menu toda a hora para redistribuir seus pontos e desbloquear outras armadilhas, fora isso o jogo é ótimo e vale cada centavo.

Nota: 9/10

184188568.review:
Trata-se da continuação do queridíssimo jogo de defesa de torres.

A qualidade gráfica, direção de arte e trilha sonora, seguem a risca o primeiro título, nesses aspectos, não há novidades, simplesmente funcionam com a proposta do jogo.

Em relação as novidades:

Agora temos 3 modos; história (campanha), clássico (fases do primeiro título) e infinito (modo feito e balanceado para multiplier.)

Adicionaram diversos inimigos de maior hierarquia, todos são ótimos e adicionam complexidade ao jogo.

Adicionaram mais uma personagem, tão carismática e eficiente quanto o clássico "aprendiz".

Simplesmente um jogão! recomendo!

184111235.review:
Um jogo antigo, esquecido, mas um clássico divertido
- Mate orcs sem parar, orcs devem morrer!
- Jogo vai de simples a complexo, vc pode jogar como preferir
- Varias formas de buildar e matar orcs
- Vale muito a pena para jogar com um amigo
- Entrega muitas horas de jogo pelo valor

183943933.review:
[h1]タワーディフェンスとアクションバランスが神[/h1]
トラップの成長要素が加わって、ついついやってしまいます。
意見分かれるところですが１より圧倒的にハマりました。
入口と出口が増えて大分忙しいですが、ソロでもナイトメア５スカルなんとかいけます。
ハイブはマジできつかった。
◎多彩な敵、多彩なマップ、多彩な攻略法で奥が深い。
◎トラップの成長要素でスカル欲しさにやってしまう。

183794605.review:
Ein spaßiges Spiel, leider trüben viele Bugs und Crashes den Spielspaß. 
Coop ist das Spiel praktisch unspielbar, da einer von beiden fast immer einen Crash to Desktop (CTD) bekommt, ohne eine Fehlermeldung. So kann man kaum ein Level vernünftig beenden.

Ich kann das Spiel in dem Zustand nicht empfehlen, alleine mag es spielbar sein aber dafür habe ich es nicht gekauft. OMD3 dagegen läuft besser und stabiler.
